meanings.definition: A device used for projecting images onto a screen.
meanings.sent1: The teacher used the epidiascopes to show us pictures of animals.
meanings.sent2: During the presentation, the speaker utilized epidiascopes to display graphs and charts.
meanings.sent3: The epidiascopes decided to take a break and projected funny cat videos instead of the presentation slides.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an epidiascope, casting warmth and brightness wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The epidiascopes hummed softly as it brought the ancient painting to life on the classroom wall.
